column2: IDEA-209622: VCS Ignore minor changes option

column3: VCS Ignore minor changes option: some VCS changes (e.g. git commit, or github PR) contains only cosmetic changes like formatting, line ending and/or imports reformatting: diff view for those files shows no changes due to used text ignore settings. It makes review and search over vcs history harder.
This PR adds option to ignore minor (in terms of used text ignore settings) changes to VCS History, Github PR, and other VCS-related changes.
